title: The Queen's Daughter
description: 12 Terror Filled Hours.A True Story.On February 12, 1976, six young and beautiful women prepared for a big night out in Detroit.One did not make it home that night.She was kidnapped and held for 12 hours against her will. The experience was so brutal and frightening that she begged her assailants to kill her.Instead, they let her go.28 years later, Melissa McCormick is finally ready to tell about the night she became The Queen`s Daughter.
author: Melissa McCormick
